description: This file defines the Perplexity class for interacting with Perplexity's language models, including methods for request parameter generation and response parsing, utilizing external OpenAI chat types and project-specific models.

classes.name: Perplexity
classes.description: A class for using models hosted on Perplexity, extending OpenAILike, with methods for request parameter generation and response parsing.

methods.name: get_request_params
methods.description: Generates request parameters for API calls, including optional response format and additional parameters.

methods.name: parse_provider_response
methods.description: Parses the API response into a ModelResponse object, handling errors, extracting message content, tool calls, citations, and usage.

methods.name: parse_provider_response_delta
methods.description: Parses streaming response chunks into a ModelResponse, extracting content, tool calls, citations, and usage.
